revised_title: Velocity Comparison of Alpha-Particles from Radioactive Elements
tldr: The authors compared the velocities of alpha-particles emitted by various radioactive elements using a combined source and magnetic field. They measured the radius of curvature of the alpha-particles' paths and calculated the ratio of their velocities. This method allowed them to determine the velocities of alpha-particles from radium C', thorium C and C', and radium F.
